org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.javafx

Class JavaFXSearchWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.gui.javafx.JavaFXSearchWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget, GUISearchWindow

    public class JavaFXSearchWindow
extends javafx.stage.Stage
implements GUISearchWindow
    Provides interactive search Window and search capabilities. We extend from Stage to add search into the left side-tab or to pop open a search window when either style==SEARCH_EXTERNAL_WINDOW || style==SEARCH_TABBED_PANE search style can be controlled from Viewer preferences.

    • Property Summary
